subtitles.transcript: I think that we need to be very careful about the trends underway. There is not a trend toward alumni giving
in a big way, by the way. I think the trends we need to be careful about are the tuitions and fees
that are really hitting very hard the middle and lower middle-class families and at the same time,
more and more of our students being out of state and from abroad primarily – not because they’re not excellent students,
but in large part because they can bring tuitions. They pay retail when we are trying to subsidize
a lot of our poor and lower-middle class students who can’t possibly pay the sticker price. These are things to watch out for,
these are things to worry about, but at this stage, I don’t think we’re in any huge danger.
